body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Edward Henderson and the customer's name is Sara Gonzales.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Edward Henderson, and I'm with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Edward, I'm Sara Gonzales. I'm just looking for some information about your motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Sara! What type of motorcycles are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something stylish and powerful, maybe a cruiser.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We have a fantastic selection of cruisers. Could I please have your zip code so I can provide you with specific options available in your area?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my zip code is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And just for our records, could you provide me with your phone number as well?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one two three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Sara! I’ll make sure to keep you informed about the best options for cruisers based on your location.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Edward. This has been very informative.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Sara! Thank you for your time, and remember, if you have any more questions, feel free to reach out to us at Phat Hogs. Have a great day!
